background_darkPatternDetectionText.message: Starting detection of dark patterns in the cookie notice.

background_doubleInteractionText.message: Starting interaction with a nested button: $text1$ > $text2$

background_downloadingModelsText.message: Starting download of AI models for the analysis of the cookie notice. If CookieAudit has not been used recently, this may take some time. You can follow the progress in the popup on the top right.

background_finishedReportText.message: The report of your scan is ready. You can download it from the popup at the top right.

background_ieErrorText.message: The interaction with the button did not work. We are skipping it.

background_ieSuccessText.message: The interaction with the button was successful. Starting interaction with webpage (scrolling and clicking on links).

background_interactWoBannerText.message: Starting interaction with the website (scrolling and clicking on links), while ignoring the cookie banner.

background_noNoticeText.message: This functionality has not been added yet. Sorry.

background_startingClassificationText.message: The download has finished. The analysis of the cookie banner starts now.

popup_cookieDeleteInfo.message: All cookies currently stored in the browser will be deleted. This will result in you being logged out of your accounts on other websites. If you don't want this to happen, please install CookieAudit in a separate browser.

popup_initialInstruction.message: Open the target website and close all other tabs and browser windows before starting a scan.

popup_invalidWebsite.message: You cannot start a scan on the current website.

popup_noticeInteraction.message: CookieAudit is currently interacting with the notice.

popup_pageInteraction.message: CookieAudit is currently interacting with the webpage.

popup_secondSelection.message: Please select the notice that contains the cookie settings.

popup_skipSelection.message: Please select the cookie notice. If there is no notice, skip the selection below.

popup_stoppingScan.message: Please wait while the scan is being stopped.

popup_tooManyTabsText.message: More than one tab is open. Please close the other tabs.

popup_tooManyWindowsText.message: More than one window of this browser is open. Please close the other windows.

popup_waitForAnalysis.message: Please wait while the notice is being analyzed.

popup_waitForLoad.message: Please wait until the website has finished loading.

popup_waitForModels.message: Please wait until the AI models have been downloaded.

selector_querySelectorTimeoutText.message: Please report this website and the following error to the CookieAudit team: Timeout while finding querySelectors.

selector_selectNewNoticeText.message: Please select the new element that contains the cookie settings. Selection begins after this notice disappears.

selector_selectNoticeText.message: Please select the cookie notice. Selection begins after this notice disappears. If there is no cookie banner, skip the selection in the popup on the top right.
